backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor exposing a single `ping` query function that returns the string 'pong'.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the greeting text in HomePage.tsx was changed from 'Good morning ðŸ‘‹' to 'Hi Dev...ðŸ’›' with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing each file's role and notable implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes, applied globally to base elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting up PWA meta tags, Google Fonts preloads, and mounting the root div with the main module script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for MyOrganizer Pro, defining app name, icons, display mode, and theme colors.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first with network fallback strategy for static assets, with cache versioning and notification click handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing tab-based navigation, lazy-loading Notes and Records pages, initializing settings and seeding the database on mount, and rendering the AppLayout with a ToastContainer.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSp: Provides a spinning `LoadingSpinner` component and a `PageSkeleton` placeholder used during lazy page loads.
frontend/src/components/common/Modal.tsx: Accessible modal dialog component with configurable size, scroll lock, Escape key dismissal, focus management, and a sticky header with close button.
frontend/src/components/common/ToastCont: Renders a stack of toast notifications with success, error, and info variants, each dismissible via a close button.
frontend/src/components/home/QuoteWidget: Home page widget displaying the current daily quote with custom font/color/alignment styling, navigating to the Quote page on tap.
frontend/src/components/home/StreakWidge: Home page widget showing the current streak count and last check-in time (formatted via `formatDateTime`), linking to the Streak page.
frontend/src/components/home/TodayRoutin: Home page widget displaying up to four items from today's routine profile with formatted times, linking to the Routines page.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that composes the sidebar (desktop), main content area, and bottom tab bar (mobile) into a full-screen flex container.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Desktop-only sidebar with logo, navigation buttons for five app tabs, and a footer attribution link; hidden on mobile via Tailwind's md breakpoint.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar rendering five tab buttons with active-state indicators; hidden on desktop via Tailwind's md breakpoint.
frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManag: Modal component for creating, renaming, and deleting note labels, with a color picker and an inline edit flow backed by the useLabels hook.
frontend/src/components/notes/MultiSelec: Fixed top toolbar shown during multi-note selection, displaying the selected count and action buttons for archiving, trashing, and clearing the selection.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: Masonry-style card component for displaying a single note with support for text, checklist, and image types, long-press selection, pin indicator, and a context menu.
Full-screen modal for viewing and editing a note, supporting text, checklist, and image types with color picker, label picker, reminder, and image upload/compression.
frontend/src/components/notes/QuickAddBa: Collapsed input bar that expands to let the user choose between text, checklist, or image note types before triggering the onAdd callback.
frontend/src/components/streak/CheckInBu: Displays the current streak count and a check-in button that switches to a disabled 'Checked In' state with green styling once the user has checked in for the day.
frontend/src/components/streak/StreakCal: A React calendar component that displays a monthly view with check-in history highlighted, supporting month navigation via chevron buttons.
frontend/src/db/db.ts: Defines and exports a singleton OrganizerDB instance that groups all IndexedDB tables (notes, routines, records, streak, quotes, labels, imageBlobs, settings) using a Table wrapper.
frontend/src/db/idb.ts: A lightweight native IndexedDB wrapper providing a Table class with add, put, get, delete, toArray, count, and clear operations, replacing Dexie.
frontend/src/db/schema.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining the data shapes for all IndexedDB stores: Note, RoutineProfile, Record, StreakData, QuoteData, Label, ImageBlob, and AppSettings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageStorage.ts: A React hook providing saveImage, getImageUrl, and deleteImage helpers that persist and retrieve image blobs in IndexedDB via the imageBlobs table.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, clear, identity, and status state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabels.ts: A React hook that manages CRUD operations for labels stored in IndexedDB, exposing labels state along with createLabel, updateLabel, and deleteLabel functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: A React hook managing notes in IndexedDB with support for filtering by view (all/archive/trash), search, and label, plus CRUD and trash/restore/archive operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a usePing React Query hook that calls the backend actor's ping method, returning 'offline' if the actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuote.ts: React hook for loading, saving, and rotating motivational quotes from IndexedDB, supporting shuffle and daily rotation modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecords.ts: React hook for managing journal/log records in IndexedDB with search, date filtering, CRUD operations, and JSON export.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: React hook for managing weekday and weekend routine profiles in IndexedDB, supporting add, update, delete, reorder, and toggle-complete operations on routine items.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: React hook that locks and unlocks body scroll by toggling CSS position/overflow styles, preserving scroll position when unlocked.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: React hook for tracking a daily check-in streak in IndexedDB, handling streak continuation, resets, and today's check-in status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines light/dark CSS custom properties (oklch color tokens), and provides utility component classes like note-card and masonry-grid.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a live clock/date header, streak, quote, and today's routine widgets, plus a floating quick-add note button.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Notes page component supporting note creation, viewing, multi-select bulk actions, label management, and switching between all/archive/trash views.
frontend/src/pages/QuotePage.tsx: A settings/editor page for configuring a motivational quote widget, with live preview and options for font, color, alignment, blur, rotation mode, and a managed list of quotes.
frontend/src/pages/RecordsPage.tsx: A CRUD page for personal records with search, date filtering, export to JSON, and a modal form for adding or editing entries.
frontend/src/pages/RoutinesPage.tsx: A routines management page supporting weekday/weekend profiles with drag-and-drop reordering, completion toggling, and a modal form for adding or editing routine items.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: An app settings page for toggling theme, accent color, font, background image, storage usage display, and full data export/import/clear functionality.
frontend/src/pages/StreakPage.tsx: A streak tracker page displaying the current streak count, a check-in button, stats summary, and a calendar view of check-in history.
frontend/src/store/appStore.ts: A Zustand store managing global app appearance state (theme, accent color, font) with functions to apply and persist each setting to the DOM and localStorage.
frontend/src/store/toastStore.ts: A Zustand store for managing toast notifications with auto-dismiss after 3.5 seconds, exposing helper functions for success, error, and info toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dataValidation.ts: Validates imported JSON data by checking that required top-level arrays (notes, routines, records, labels) are present and returns a result with any errors.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Exports a `formatDateTime` utility that converts strings, numbers, or Date objects into a human-readable '28 Feb 2026, 3:45 AM' format, handling date-only strings and invalid input gracefully.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Provides `compressImage` and `generateThumbnail` functions that use a canvas to resize and compress image files to JPEG blobs with configurable max width and quality.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Exports helpers to request browser notification permission and schedule a delayed browser notification at a specific timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/seedData.ts: Seeds the Dexie database with default notes, records, streak, quotes, and routines if each table is empty, providing initial demo content for new users.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorkerRegistra: Registers the app's service worker (`/sw.js`) on page load, silently ignoring failures so the app continues to function without it.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Provides typed localStorage getters and setters for three UI settings: theme (light/dark), accent color, and font family.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, oklch-based semantic color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes, with dark mode via class and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and feature state, recording one completed feature that replaced the HomePage greeting text from 'Good morning ðŸ‘‹' to 'Hi Dev...ðŸ’›'.
